extendedInfo.description: Tired of spending too much money at the pharmacy? Discounts and coupons just not enough for your medication? Then try Drug Buddy.Drug Buddy can hook you up with your medications for free from the pharmaceutical companies through their patient assistance programs. Pick up your medication at the pharmacy or have it sent straight to your home, depending on how the program works. It's easy to find your medication on our list, contact the company, and get the help you need.Other companies offer only discounts on certain drugs, Drug Buddy lets you get your FDA approved medication for free if you qualify under the terms of the patient assistance program. Get real financial freedom from your costly prescriptions with Drug Buddy.
